001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
010import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service.PlayingFieldRepository;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
015import javax.inject.Inject;
016import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
017
018/**
019 * Annotation used in conjunction with Hilt, a dependency injection library for Android.
020 * Indicates that this class, GameFieldViewModel, is a ViewModel and should be managed
021 * by Hilt's dependency injection mechanism.
022 * Extends the Android ViewModel class and implements DefaultLifecycleObserver, which
023 * allows for observation and handling of the Android lifecycle events.
024 * Hilt, upon encountering this annotation, will take charge of creating and managing
025 * instances of this ViewModel, simplifying the process of injecting dependencies and
026 * ensuring proper lifecycle handling within an Android app.
027 */
028@HiltViewModel
029public class GameFieldViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
030
031  private static final String TAG = GameFieldViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
032  private final PlayingFieldRepository playingFieldRepository;
033  private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> running;
034  private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> inProgress;
035  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
036  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
037  private double gravity;
038  private double velocity;
039  private int angle;
040
041  @Inject
042  GameFieldViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context,
043      PlayingFieldRepository playingFieldRepository) {
044    this.playingFieldRepository = playingFieldRepository;
045    running = new MutableLiveData<>();
046    inProgress = new MutableLiveData<>();
047    this.throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
048    this.pending = new CompositeDisposable();
049    create();
050  }
051
052  public void create() {
053    playingFieldRepository.create();
054  }
055
056  public void run() {
057    playingFieldRepository
058        .run()
059        .subscribe(
060            inProgress::postValue,
061            this::postThrowable,
062            () -> {
063              // TODO: 11/16/23 Take appropriate action for the game paused.
064            },
065            pending
066        );
067  }
068
069  public void paused() {
070    playingFieldRepository.pause();
071  }
072
073  public LiveData<GameField> getGameField() {
074    return playingFieldRepository.getLiveGameField();
075  }
076
077  public LiveData<Boolean> getRunning() {
078    return running;
079  }
080
081  public LiveData<Boolean> getInProgress() {
082    return inProgress;
083  }
084
085  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
086    return throwable;
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  public void onPause(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
091    playingFieldRepository.pause();
092    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onPause(owner);
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public void onStop(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
097    pending.clear();
098    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
099  }
100
101  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
102    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
103    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
104  }
105
106
107  public boolean isGameOver() {
108    return playingFieldRepository.isGameOver();
109  }
110
111  public void setGravity(double gravity) {
112    playingFieldRepository.setGravity(gravity);
113  }
114
115  public void setVelocity(double velocity) {
116    playingFieldRepository.setVelocity(velocity);
117  }
118
119  public void setAngle(int angle) {
120    playingFieldRepository.setAngle(angle);
121  }
122
123  public void shipMoveUp() {
124    playingFieldRepository.shipMoveUp();
125  }
126
127  public void shipMoveDown() {
128    playingFieldRepository.shipMoveDown();
129  }
130
131  public void shoot() {
132    playingFieldRepository.shoot();
133  }
134}
